indicator.summary: Average Directional Movement Index (ADX) is a measure of price directional movement. It includes upward and downward indicators, and is often used to measure strength of trend. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
indicator.returns: Time series of ADX and Plus/Minus Directional values.
